titleInfo.title: The changing structure of living arrangements and its consequences for social networks and social support
Opportunities and challenges in an ageing society

bibliographicCitation.wels: Glatzer, W.; Diewald, M. (1992): The changing structure of living arrangements and its consequences for social networks and social support. In: Wim J. A. van den Heuvel (Hrsg.): Opportunities and challenges in an ageing society. Amsterdam [u.a.]: North Holland. (Verhandelingen / Koninklijke Nederlandse Akademie van Wetenschappen, Afd. Letterkunde ; N.R., 151, ). S. 61-70.
